name: automation-exercise-saucedemo-dummyjson
description: End-to-end UI and API automation framework based on CodeceptJS, Playwright, REST helper and Gherkin with Allure reporting

scripts.test:ui: npm run clean:ui && npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.conf.js --steps
scripts.test:ui:headless: npm run clean:ui && npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.conf.js --steps --headless
scripts.test:api: npm run clean:api && npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.api.conf.js --steps
scripts.test:ui:report: npm run test:ui && npm run allure:generate:ui && npm run allure:open:ui
scripts.test:api:report: npm run test:api && npm run allure:generate:api && npm run allure:open:api
scripts.test:ui:one:report: npm run clean:ui && npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.conf.js --steps
scripts.test:api:one:report: npm run clean:api && npx codeceptjs run -c codecept.api.conf.js --steps
scripts.report:ui: npm run allure:generate:ui && npm run allure:open:ui
scripts.report:api: npm run allure:generate:api && npm run allure:open:api
scripts.test:all: npm run test:ui && npm run test:api
scripts.test:all:report: npm run test:all && npm run allure:generate:ui && npm run allure:generate:api
